about_the_game:
Embark on an unforgettable adventure in the hidden object game "Gloomy Tales: Horrific Show"! Mini-games, puzzles and hidden objects await you! Try to find all the hidden objects in the extra locations!
This downloadable content contains four new locations! In the main game, try to drive through the tunnel of horror, explore Roshar's case and explore the mysterious basement! In the bonus game, explore the items hidden in the chest you found in the basement room!

Thrill! This Halloween, you have to go to the famous traveling monster circus show!
The chilling tale of the circus monsters continues in this additional downloadable content "Gloomy Tales: Horrific Show DLC", full of unforgettable adventures!
In the new locations, you can learn new details about the characters and uncover all the secrets of the traveling circus. Unlock new achievements after completing all the quests!

🎈 EXPERIENCE REAL HORROR!
Meet all the conditions to drive through the tunnel of horror! Find mysterious objects by participating in the festival's entertainment programme!

🎈 EXPLORE THE MYSTERY ITEMS!
What's hidden in the case? What if there's something scary in there? Find out more about Rochard by examining his personal belongings!

🎈 EXPLORE THE BASEMENT ROOM!
Solve the puzzles and go through the mini-games to collect all the hidden items in the basement!

🎈 FIND OUT WHAT'S HIDDEN IN THE CHEST!
In the additional location bonus game you have to open the mysterious chest and find out what secrets it holds!
